Reported Consolidated quarterly numbers for Pricol are:Net Sales at Rs 577.82 crore in September 2023 up 12.02% from Rs. 515.83 crore in September 2022.

articles.title: Markets unlikely to see major drawdown unless macros managed badly: S Naren - Moneycontrol
articles.description: In India, the interest rate hike has been very little, because macro has been managed much better, Naren says.
